comments:
Scenario: Create simple EJB project. In the wizard set name for example ?Test%A101?. In this case when try to finish creation the system triggered error:
?Save could not be completed. Some related files may have already been saved.
Reason:
Resource ?/Testi01? does not exist ?

The problem occurred because in the method ReferencedXMIResourceImplsave trying to decode the URI and system convert file?s name to be Testi01, but in the workspace the project was created with ?Test%A101? name.

Here is the Exception Stack Trace:


org.eclipse.wst.common.frameworks.internal.SaveFailedException: !An_error_occurred_while_sa_ERROR_!
